APICallType.title: APICall
APICallType.description: Serves as a method for characterizing API Calls, as implementations of Malware Actions.

address.description: Captures the hexadecimal address of the API call in the binary.

return_value.description: Captures the return value of the API call.

parameters.description: Captures a list of function parameters. Each key in the dictionary MUST be a string that captures the exact name of the parameter, and each corresponding key value MUST be a string that captures the corresponding parameter value.For parameter values that can be represented by a constant, e.g., GENERIC_WRITE, the constant rather than the literal SHOULD be used. For cases where the parameter cannot be represented by a constant, the literal (as reported by the tool, etc.) MUST be used.

function_name.description: Captures the exact name of the API function called, e.g. CreateFileEx
